Params: {3: 'The storyline always has twists and turns. No one ever wants a dull life. Our protagonist will always go through a perilous journey with wits and agility. The evil villains are like faithful followers. Each of them carries important responsibilities that no one else can bear for them.'}

{3: "The deadly vipers always reveal themselves at the exact right moment, just like how pigeons timely come out of a magician's hat. Calamity always bides its time, and it will agonize its prey until fear grips the audience's hearts, tears roll down their cheeks, and rounds of applause burst out."}
{3: 'Upon realizing this ridiculous thought in your head, you let out a wry smile, put down the raft that you are making, and look in the direction where the sound is coming from.'}
{3: 'â€”This is the destiny of a champion.'}
{3: 'You notice the subtle difference in the sound. The dragon roar is there before you hear the pipe.'}
